text: Timothy Dupont (born 1 November 1987 in Ghent) is a Belgian cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . In July 2018, he was named in the start list for the Tour de France. ==Major results== ;2010 : 1st Grote Prijs Stad Geel : 6th Beverbeek Classic : 6th Dwars door de Antwerpse Kempen : 7th Nationale Sluitingsprijs : 10th Omloop van het Houtland : 10th Kampioenschap van Vlaanderen ;2011 : 2nd Gooikse Pijl : 3rd Omloop van het Waasland : 9th Schaal Sels-Merksem ;2012 : 1st 20px Road race, National Amateur Road Championships : 1st Stage 4 Tour de Liège : 3rd Omloop van het Houtland : 5th Gooikse Pijl : 5th Antwerpse Havenpijl : 6th Binche–Tournai–Binche : 6th Ronde van Limburg : 8th Dorpenomloop Rucphen : 9th Nationale Sluitingsprijs ;2013 : 1st Overall Tweedaagse van Gaverstreek ::1st Stage 2 : 2nd Overall Tour du Loir-et-Cher ::1st 20px Points classification : Tour de Bretagne ::1st 20px Points classification ::1st Stages 3 & 5 : 2nd Nationale Sluitingsprijs : 6th Kampioenschap van Vlaanderen : 7th Druivenkoers Overijse : 7th Gooikse Pijl : 7th Grand Prix Criquielion : 7th De Kustpijl Prix Criquielion : 1st Grand Prix de la ville de Pérenchies : 1st Antwerpse Havenpijl : 1st De Kustpijl : 1st Kampioenschap van Vlaanderen : 1st Memorial Van Coningsloo : Tour Alsace ::1st 20px Points
